articles.description: England captain Ben Stokes says Zak Crawley is "argumentative", but the opener repaid the faith shown by the skipper with a memorable Ashes hundred.
articles.title: 'Argumentative' Crawley vindicates England faith

articles.description: Tommy Fleetwood raises hopes of a first English winner of The Open in 31 years with a superb five-under-par 66 on the opening morning at Royal Liverpool.
articles.title: Fleetwood sets early pace at Hoylake Open

articles.description: New Zealand's players had tears in their eyes after defeating Norway in the opening game of the 2023 Women's World Cup - while Australia's own winning feeling was one of relief.
articles.title: 'Goosebumps' - New Zealand and Australia's night of emotion

articles.description: Zak Crawley's astonishing 189 stuns Australia and keeps England on course for an Ashes comeback on an exhilarating second day of the fourth Test at Old Trafford.
articles.title: Crawley's sublime 189 stuns Australia

articles.description: Manchester United complete the £47.2m (55m euro) signing of goalkeeper Andre Onana from Inter Milan on a five-year contract.
articles.title: Man Utd complete signing of Onana for £47.2m

articles.description: Zak Crawley's astonishing 189 stuns Australia and keeps England on course for an Ashes comeback on an exhilarating second day of the fourth Test at Old Trafford.
articles.title: Astonishing Crawley century stuns Australia

articles.description: A Jordan Spieth approach shot and long-range Rory McIlroy putt feature in a round-up of the best shots on day one of the 2023 Open at Hoylake.
articles.title: Spieth and McIlroy among opening round Shots of the Day

articles.description: Co-hosts New Zealand open the 2023 Fifa Women's World Cup in stunning style against Norway as they win on the global stage for the first time.
articles.title: New Zealand stun Norway at Women's World Cup

articles.description: Spain defender Jordi Alba joins ex-Barcelona team-mates Lionel Messi and Sergio Busquets at Inter Miami on a deal to the end of the 2024 season.
articles.title: Alba joins Messi & Busquets at Inter Miami

articles.description: Kasper Asgreen claims his first Tour de France stage victory as he holds on to win stage 18 of this year's race.
articles.title: Asgreen wins stage 18 as Vingegaard closes on title
